title: Manny Pacquiao Should Fight Terence Crawford In His Farewell Bout
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
After dispatching Dierry Jean on Saturday, Terence Crawford has made Manny Pacquiao's choice easy. Pacquiao should choose to fight Crawford ...
